languages.text: "Наблюдаю, как утекает время. Люди не задумываются, сколько вдохов им осталось сделать до поцелуя смерти. В незнании... есть своя красота".
"Watching time slip away. People never pause to consider how many breaths they have left to take before they feel the kiss of death. Ignorance... has its own form of beauty."
languages.original_text: "Наблюдаю, как утекает время. Люди не задумываются, сколько вдохов им осталось сделать до поцелуя смерти. В незнании... есть своя красота".

traits.locale_text: "Watching time trickle away. People never pause and think how many breaths they have left to take before death kisses them. Ignorance... has a kind of beauty to it."
"Watching time trickle away. People never pause and think how many breaths they have left to take before death kisses them. Ignorance... has a kind of beauty to it."
"Watching time slip away. People never pause to consider how many breaths they have left to take before they feel the kiss of death. Ignorance... has its own form of beauty."
"Watching time slip away. People never pause to consider how many breaths they have left to take before they feel the kiss of death. Ignorance... has its own form of beauty."
"Watching time slip away. People never pause to consider how many breaths they have left to take before they feel the kiss of death. Ignorance... has its own form of beauty."
"Watching time slip away. People never pause to consider how many breaths they have left to take before they feel the kiss of death. Ignorance... has its own form of beauty."

languages.text: «Observar el paso del tiempo. La gente nunca se detiene a considerar cuántos alientos les quedan hasta sentir el beso de la muerte. La ignorancia... cuenta con una belleza particular».
languages.original_text: "Watching time slip away. People never pause to consider how many breaths they have left to take before they feel the kiss of death. Ignorance... has its own form of beauty."

traits.locale_text: «Observar el paso del tiempo. La gente nunca se detiene a considerar cuántos alientos les quedan hasta sentir el beso de la muerte. La ignorancia... cuenta con una belleza particular».

languages.text: 「時が過ぎ去るのを見ている。人は、死の口づけを感じるまで、あと何回分の呼吸が残っているのかを考えて立ち止まることはない。無知には…独特の美しさがある」
languages.original_text: "Watching time slip away. People never pause to consider how many breaths they have left to take before they feel the kiss of death. Ignorance... has its own form of beauty."

traits.locale_text: 「時が過ぎ去るのを見ている。人は、死の口づけを感じるまで、あと何回分の呼吸が残っているのかを考えて立ち止まることはない。無知には…独特の美しさがある」

languages.text: “看着时间悄悄溜走。人们从来都不会停下来想想，在死亡之吻触碰到他们的脸颊之前，他们还能呼吸多少次。无知……也有种独特的美。”
languages.original_text: "Watching time slip away. People never pause to consider how many breaths they have left to take before they feel the kiss of death. Ignorance... has its own form of beauty."

traits.locale_text: “看着时间悄悄溜走。人们从来都不会停下来想想，在死亡之吻触碰到他们的脸颊之前，他们还能呼吸多少次。无知……也有种独特的美。”

languages.text: "Zusehen, wie die Zeit entgleitet. Die Leute halten niemals inne, um zu bedenken, wie viele Atemzüge ihnen bis zum Kuss des Todes noch bleiben. Unwissenheit ... hat ihre ganz eigene Form der Schönheit."
languages.original_text: "Watching time slip away. People never pause to consider how many breaths they have left to take before they feel the kiss of death. Ignorance... has its own form of beauty."

traits.locale_text: "Zusehen, wie die Zeit entgleitet. Die Leute halten niemals inne, um zu bedenken, wie viele Atemzüge ihnen bis zum Kuss des Todes noch bleiben. Unwissenheit ... hat ihre ganz eigene Form der Schönheit."

languages.text: « J'observe le temps s'écouler. Personne ne prend jamais le temps de s'arrêter pour réfléchir au nombre de respirations qu'il leur reste avant de sentir le doux baiser de la mort. L'ignorance... est une forme de beauté. »
languages.original_text: "Watching time slip away. People never pause to consider how many breaths they have left to take before they feel the kiss of death. Ignorance... has its own form of beauty."

traits.locale_text: « J'observe le temps s'écouler. Personne ne prend jamais le temps de s'arrêter pour réfléchir au nombre de respirations qu'il leur reste avant de sentir le doux baiser de la mort. L'ignorance... est une forme de beauté. »

languages.text: "Zamanın akıp gidişini izliyorum. İnsanlar, ölümün soğuk nefesini hissedene dek ciğerlerinde daha kaç soluk kaldığını asla durup düşünmüyor. Cehaletin... Kendine has bir güzelliği var."
languages.original_text: "Watching time slip away. People never pause to consider how many breaths they have left to take before they feel the kiss of death. Ignorance... has its own form of beauty."
